name: ChestCTWithContrast
title: Chest CT with Contrast
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a CT of the chest with contrast.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a CT of the chest using contrast.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts specific to only CT of chest without contrast.)
